com.durbha.jc.pwhasher.http

Class HTTPReqParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.durbha.jc.pwhasher.http.HTTPReqParser

  • public class HTTPReqParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses the incoming socket connection, per HTTP specification(s).

    It also enforces certain limitations on the request. For example, a header line cannot be more than 300.

    Another check is on the content length - maximum content length supported is 5000 by default.

    • Method Detail

      • parseInputStream

        public HTTPRequest parseInputStream()
                             throws InvalidInputException
        Process the input stream to extract HTTP request method, URI, message body and other headers.

        Processed values are used to create the HTTPRequest object.

        Returns:
        Parsed values populated into a HTTPRequest object
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - If any of the input validations fail
